message.name: ERR_ROSTERGENERATIONFREQUENCY_XRV_EFFECTIVEDATE_MUST_BE_AFTER_TODAY
message.locale: The Effective Date,%1d, must be on or after the current date.

message.name: ERR_ROSTERGENERATIONFREQUENCY_XRV_FREQUENCY_STATUS_LIVE_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The configuration is 'Active', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_ROSTERGENERATIONFREQUENCY_XRV_FREQUENCY_STATUS_SUPERSEDED_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The configuration is 'Superseded', it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_ROSTERGENERATIONFREQUENCY_XRV_FREQUENCY_STATUS_LIVE_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The configuration is 'Active', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_ROSTERGENERATIONFREQUENCY_XRV_FREQUENCY_STATUS_SUPERSEDED_CANNOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: The configuration is 'Superseded', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_ROSTERGENERATIONFREQUENCY_FV_ROSTER_GENERATION_FREQUENCY_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: Roster Generation Frequency must be entered.

message.name: ERR_ROSTERGENERATIONFREQUENCY_FV_RECORD_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: This roster generation frequency is already deleted.
